name: Fry N' Load
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 32 in April 2015 (theme: an unconventional weapon).

A delicious food fight competition. Play online with a friend! (internet required)

Keyboard only supported.

Credits:
Matt Blickem (Design, Code) - https://twitter.com/mattblickem
Luke Walker (Design, Code, 3D Models) - https://twitter.com/landwulf
Sami Tanbouz (Design, Code, 3D Models) - http://tanbouz.com

Source Code: https://github.com/explosivose/LD32

Resources:

Main menu music (Game Show Theme Tune) by FoolBoyMedia
End of game music (Remix of 96962__milton_intro_remix_#2) by Timbre
